content: The apps in my Panasonic TV broke last night. Turns out Netflix etc. must phone home to a Panasonic URL even if it's down https://www.avforums.com/threads/network-issue-with-panasonic-cloud-services-for-lcd-tv-with-firefox-os.1985724/page-7#post-23313595
